text: Something Special is the fifth album by the Los Angeles, California-based R&B; group the Sylvers. ==Reception== Released in November, 1976, this was the family's second album for Capitol Records, and their fifth album overall. Produced by Freddie Perren, "Something Special" would be the last album in which the Sylvers would team with the veteran producer. Two singles were released from this set: "Hot Line" peaked at #3, and "High School Dance" peaked at #6. ==Track listing== * All songs written by Freddie Perren and Kenneth St. Lewis, except where noted.The Sylvers - Something Special (LP liner notes).
